Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_DeliveryCompany' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'shipping_time_matching1') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_DeliveryCompany ADD shipping_time_matching1 nvarchar(100) DEFAULT ('') NOT NULL EXEC('UPDATE w2_DeliveryCompany SET shipping_time_matching1 = shipping_time_message1');
